column5: As a few of you may know by my past posts, I have an eight month old lab named Toby. He had a little trouble and ended up in the hospital for a digestive issue. Well, he is back on the mend and is a happy pup again. With the nice day on Saturday, it was time to launch the boat for the season and time to get Toby on the boat.  He had a great time watches the floats and barking at the perch. He even decided to go for his first swim (thus the reason for the leash). Hope itâ€™s the first of many more trips. Here are a few shots of him.  Thanks for reading .
Cool...hope my wife does not see this...she's set on a dog...choc lab
Hope see has a lot of time on her hands. LOL. Great dog BUT they are like children, they cant be left alone for very long. My little guy's middle name is "trouble" We love him though.
They make great fishing buddies !!! Intelligence is what gets em into trouble They are too smart for thier own good sometimes  Enjoy him  Paul
Thanks Paul I will. They do make good fishing buddies. Not like my wife
Glad your pup is on the mend Tony   and that you enjoyed your first journey together Thanks for sharing Jacques
